text: Snow Patrol is an alternative rock band from Scotland and Northern Ireland. They are based in Glasgow and are signed to Polydor Records. Snow Patrol was started as an indie rock band, but began to play more alternative rock and pop songs. The band has released seven albums, Songs for Polarbears, Final Straw, When It's All Over We Still Have to Clear Up, Eyes Open, A Hundred Million Suns, Fallen Empires and Wildness. Eyes Open won the award for Best Irish Album at the National Irish Music Awards. == References == Category:1994 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:1990s British music groups Category:2000s British music groups Category:2010s British music groups Category:Alternative rock bands Category:Scottish rock bands Category:1990s establishments in Scotland
title: Snow Patrol
